faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions from our customers
faq.a1: Delivery time depends on the chosen shipping company and the delivery person. We provide a detailed list of shipping options, prices, and delivery times on this same page so you can easily check them before ordering.
faq.a2: Currently, the contracted shipping company delivers within Algeria for all states and a number of major cities.
faq.a3: The store offers bulk delivery service and for large orders, there is a discount of 10-15% on some products. You can contact us directly to inquire about quantities and discounts.
faq.a4:
Products can be exchanged if they are in their original condition, in original packaging, and within only two days from the receipt date.
Please photograph the product and send it with the city, address, and order number to be replaced with another product if the product is defective, damaged, or not as agreed.
faq.contactText: If you didn't find an answer to your question, you can contact our support team 24/7

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data

introduction.title: Introduction
content: Our website respects your privacy and seeks to protect your personal data.
This privacy policy explains how we collect and use your personal data (under certain circumstances). It also mentions the procedures followed to ensure the privacy of your information.

Protecting your data is very important to us. Your name and other information related to you will be used in accordance with what is stated in the privacy policy. We will collect information when necessary or if it is directly relevant to our transactions with you.
You can browse the site without needing to provide any personal data. Your personal identity remains anonymous throughout your visit to the site and is not disclosed.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
content: We may need to collect your information if you want to purchase a product from our site.

We collect, store, and process your data necessary to process your purchase from our site to secure any potential claims that may arise later, and to provide you with our available services. We may collect personal information including, but not limited to, first name, last name, phone number, and delivery address.
We may give your name and address to a third party to deliver your purchase order (for example, delivery person or supplier).

thirdParties.title: Other Parties
content: We may transfer your information to other companies in our group or to our agents and contractors to help us with transactions related in accordance with the terms of the privacy policy. For example, we may resort to a third party to assist us in delivering products to you, receiving payments from you, using them for statistics and marketing research, or assisting the customer service team. We may need to share information with a third party to prevent fraud and reduce credit risks.

Your information may be disclosed to a third party without obtaining prior consent from you unless this is necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy policy, or if we are required to do so by law.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using the website

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: When visiting this site, the customer is considered to agree to the current terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms and conditions, please refrain from using the site. Site administrators reserve the right to modify, update, add, or delete parts of the terms of use and conditions at any time. Changes become effective immediately upon publication on the site without prior notice. Please review the terms of use and conditions regularly to stay informed of any updates. Your continued use of the site after changes are posted constitutes full acceptance of those changes.

siteUsage.title: Site Usage
siteUsage.content: To visit this site, you must be at least 18 years old or visit the site under the supervision of a parent or legal guardian.

ordersPricing.title: Order Approval and Pricing Details
content: Please note that in some cases, the order may not be accepted for various reasons. Site administrators reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason and at any time. Before approving the order, you may be asked to provide additional verification information, such as phone number or address.

We strive to provide accurate pricing information to all users. However, errors may sometimes occur, such as incorrect product pricing on the site. Therefore, we reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order. In case the product price is not correctly specified, we have the right, at our discretion, to contact you for instructions or cancel the order and notify you of the cancellation. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any orders whether confirmed or not.

trademarks.title: Trademarks and Copyright
trademarks.content: All intellectual property rights, whether registered or not, related to the site, its content, and designs, belong to us. This includes all software works, source codes, and core programs. All site content is protected by copyright as a single integrated work. All rights reserved.

jurisdiction.title: Governing Law and Judicial Authorities
jurisdiction.content: These terms and conditions are interpreted and applied according to the laws in force in the country. Accordingly, each party agrees to submit to the judicial authorities of the country and waive any objections related to venue.
